info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 16 at 12:41PM CDT until further notice by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON...NORTHWESTERN TILLMAN...NORTHWESTERN WILBARGER AND EAST CENTRAL HARDEMAN COUNTIES... At 1241 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northwest of Odell, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Frederick, Tipton, Manitou, Elmer, Odell and Hess. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
